name: Ready for Battle
text: Your implanted trick spurs the body in battle.
benefit: When you implant a trick, the subject gains a +2 morale bonus on initiative checks until the trick is triggered or its duration ends.
text_zh: 你植入的诡计能让受术者的身体能够更快地投入战斗。
prerequisites_zh: 催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）职业能力。
benefit_zh: 当你植入一个催眠师诡计时，受术者会在先攻检定上获得+2士气加值，直至该项催眠师诡计被触发或者持续时间结束为止。
